column1: Kata Robata////Sushi and sashimi was delicious and SO fresh. We sat at the sushi bar & watched our food prepared & we were extremely pleased to see how the chefs handled all of the fish. Food safety seemed to be a top priority here and going here you will get the freshest
column2: highest quality fish. Presentation of the food was beautiful and each piece was amazing. It was so great we went two days in a row. The first day we shared the "Chirashi" sashimi sampler- yum! Every piece was delicious. It was so good we came back the next day and had the spicy salmon roll
column3: the salmon & soft shell crab roll and several pieces of sashimi & again everything was delicious. Will be back many times!
